channel.title: MP3/4 Player + Mobile Phone Suggestions?
channel.description:
My birthday is coming up and I really want a new phone and a new mp3 or mp4 player. My phones getting a little out of date and my mp3 player is way, way out of date (surprised I haven't had to throw it away. Had it for 3 years).
MP3 Player - Sleek looking (Black preferably) - Colour Screen - 8GBs + - Small - Looks good - Price range £50-120 ($100 - 240)
Mobile Phone - Sleek looking (Black preferably) - Colour screen w/ camera - Good storage space as well as room for memory cards - Small(ish) - Looks good - Price range £100-200 ($200 - 400)
For my birthday I usually get about $600-700, so cheaper = better.
I've seen a few nice Zens about. A good example of the sort of phone I want would be a Samsung phone. [b]No flip phones :P[/b]. Preferably slide phones, or Sony Ericsson style phone.
